1467150.name: The Last Show of Mr. Chardish Soundtrack
1467150.description:
The soundtrack to "The Last Show of Mr. Chardish" lets you return to the abandoned theater and Ella's contemplative journey into the past wherever and however you wish. Included are all the game's motiffs and tracks, letting you relieve the emotions of stageplays such as "Ascension" and "Daydreaming", all in MP3, WAV and FLAC formats, or via Spotify platform for free:
https://open.spotify.com/album/3loI8ppYF8FgZatvC6qsaE?si=QMS5o2enQnqivMvgcfXlig

The full playlist, in order of appearence:
